### pysureau_init

>      pysureau_init (path:Optional[str]=None)

*Function for creating the project's main folder structure alongside with the necessary parameter files*


::: {#cell-3 .cell}
``` {.python .cell-code}
pysureau_init(path = '/tmp')
```

